layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x138
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x138
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x122
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 200x122 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutBlockFlow {CAPTION} at (0,110) size 200x12
          LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (94,0) size 12x12 [border: (1px solid #008000)]
            LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (1,1) size 302x402 [border: (1px solid #FF0000)]
              LayoutText {#text} at (147,1) size 8x19
                text run at (147,1) width 8: "d"
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 198x108
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 198x104
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,42) size 96x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 20x19
